title: Web Developer (Shopify)
description:
Ocularity Analytics is a full-service agency, servicing business, NPOs & individuals all over the globe. We leverage data science, analytics, marketing & creative expertise, to build marketing campaigns and assets that help businesses to drive growth & increase revenue. At the core, is a team of bright & creative minds, that is capable of understanding the fabric of every business, be it large corporations with aggressive marketing plans to small businesses with absolutely no web presence.

We believe our work is an expression of ourselves and we hope to develop safe spaces to promote such expression. Promoting positive work culture and employee development is an important part of our value system. We are committed towards equity, inclusion and accessibility.

Position Summary:

Ocularity Analytics is seeking a Web Developer (Shopify) to design, develop, and maintain visually appealing and user-friendly e-commerce websites for our clients using the Shopify platform. As a Shopify Web... Developer, you will have the opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of our clients' online businesses. Your technical expertise, attention to detail, and dedication to delivering high-quality work will play a crucial role in ensuring client satisfaction and achieving their e-commerce goals. Qualified candidates will be able to effectively lead multiple projects and will be responsible for not only translating marketing objectives into immersive e-commerce experiences.

While working within the e-commerce discipline, candidates must also display an aptitude for the entire technology ecosystem (e.g., integrations, application, design, etc.) The Web Developer (Shopify) will work as an integral part of the TECHNOLOGY Division and interface collaboratively with departments across the organization.

Job Duties (Other Duties as Assigned):
• Website Development: Collaborate with clients and project teams to understand their requirements and translate them into functional and visually appealing Shopify websites. Utilize your expertise in Shopify Liquid, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build custom themes, templates, and functionalities.
• Customization and Configuration: Customize existing Shopify themes or create custom themes from scratch to match clients' branding and design requirements. Configure Shopify settings, including product catalogues, collections, payment gateways, shipping methods, and tax rules, to ensure seamless functionality.
• Front-end Development: Implement responsive design principles and optimize websites for various devices and screen sizes. Use CSS preprocessors, such as SASS or LESS, to efficiently manage stylesheets and ensure consistent branding and design across the site.
• App Integration: Assess client requirements for additional functionalities and integrations and leverage the Shopify App Store or custom app development to extend the platform's capabilities. Integrate third-party apps and APIs to enhance the functionality and user experience of the websites.
• Quality Assurance: Perform thorough testing to identify and resolve any bugs, errors, or compatibility issues across different browsers and devices. Optimize website performance and loading speed to ensure an excellent user experience.
• Maintenance and Support: Provide ongoing support to clients, including troubleshooting technical issues, performing updates and patches, and addressing any website-related concerns. Keep abreast of the latest Shopify updates and trends to ensure our clients' websites remain up to date and secure.
• Collaborate on and execute development briefs along with internal team, clients, various departments and stakeholders.
• Present e-commerce strategies/concepts while integrating feedback from stakeholders.
• Multitask and juggle multiple projects with various objectives, timelines, and creative.
• Contribute to a consistent customer service standard across all departments.

Qualifications (Education/Experience/Certifications):
• 1-2 years of experience in web development, with a focus on Shopify platform.
• Proficiency in Shopify Liquid, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
• Understanding of responsive design principles and cross-browser compatibility.
• Familiarity with Shopify's theming system and ability to create custom themes and templates.
• Experience integrating third-party apps and APIs into Shopify websites.
• Knowledge of SEO best practices for e-commerce websites.
• Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently and collaboratively.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Ability to work independently on a project or in a team environment.
• Experience in managing multiple projects and deadlines and being able to work under tight timelines.
• Ability to balance being part of a team while taking responsibility for driving projects from start to finish with minimal supervision.
• We’d be happy to look at any development related work you might have compiled, you can submit an online portfolio or PDF of your work.

Please contact: hr@ocularityanalytics.com

Location: Udyog Vihar, Phase 4, Gurugram (Haryana)

Job Type: Full-time

title: Marketing Web Developer
description:
Your Impact

As a Web Developer at DISCO, your role is of utmost importance to our organization. You will have a direct impact on DISCO's success and growth in the legal technology domain. Your contributions will be instrumental in driving conversions, expanding our organic reach, and ultimately shaping the online presence of our company.

By building engaging digital experiences and implementing best-in-class website design and user experience practices, you will play a pivotal role in capturing the attention and interest of our target audience. Your expertise in web development and marketing will enable you to optimize our online platforms, enhancing the user journey and increasing conversion rates.

At DISCO, we prioritize career growth and recognize the value of investing in our team members. In this role, you will have abundant opportunities for professional development and advancement. You will work alongside a talented and collaborative digital marketing team, gaining valuable... experience and acquiring new skills that will contribute to your long-term success.

By joining DISCO as a Web Developer, you will have the chance to make a lasting impact on our company's growth, showcase your creativity and technical expertise, and shape the future of our digital presence in the legal technology market.

What You'll Do
• Develop and maintain the front-end development of the csdisco.com website, focusing on driving conversions and optimizing user experience.
• Take Figma designs provided by web designers and skillfully convert them into responsive, pixel-perfect live web pages that accurately represent the intended visual and interactive experience.
• Implement best-in-class website design practices, ensuring a seamless and visually appealing user interface.
• Create responsive layouts that provide an optimized experience for visitors across various devices, including mobile and tablets.
• Collaborate with the team to implement and test web management services, including tracking pixels, data services, and conversion beacons.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest web development trends and technologies, proactively suggesting enhancements to improve website performance, accessibility, and user engagement.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including design, content, and marketing, to ensure alignment and consistency in brand representation across all digital platforms.
• Regularly monitor and analyze website metrics, leveraging tools such as Google Analytics/Google Tag Manager, to identify opportunities for optimization and conversion rate improvement.
• Take ownership of website maintenance and updates, ensuring timely and accurate content updates, bug fixes, and security patches.
• Manage and prioritize multiple projects based on changing business requirements and deadlines.

Who You Are
• You have a proven track record as a Web Developer with at least 3 years of experience, specializing in responsive B2B websites.
• You possess strong expertise in CSS3, HTML5, and JavaScript.
• You have significant experience working with Webflow or other content management systems, demonstrating your proficiency in utilizing Webflow's features and capabilities.
• You have a passion for marketing and can effectively incorporate B2B digital marketing best practices and marketing technology expertise into your development projects.
• You pay meticulous attention to detail, ensuring pixel-perfect implementation and maintaining consistent branding across the website.
• Familiarity with website analytic tools such as Google Analytics/Google Tag Manager.
• Strong written and verbal communication skills are essential, as you will collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
• You are resourceful, a self-starter, and have a team player mindset, actively contributing ideas and solutions to achieve shared goals.
• Your problem-solving mindset allows you to think creatively and approach challenges with innovative solutions.

In this role, you will have the opportunity to utilize your technical skills, expertise in Webflow, and marketing knowledge to build engaging digital experiences, contribute to the success of DISCO's web presence, and collaborate with a dynamic and talented team.

Even Better If You Have...
• A bachelor's degree or higher in Marketing, Computer Science, Graphic Design, or Engineering.
• Familiarity with Finsweet Client First Design System, such as working with the system's components and following its guidelines for building responsive and accessible web experiences.
• Experience in Enterprise B2B, including working with CRM platforms such as Salesforce and marketing automation platforms like Pardot, Marketo, or Eloqua.
• Experience running A/B tests to evaluate and optimize website performance and user experience.
• Previous experience working at a SaaS software platform, legal technology company, or in a fast-paced technology environment.

While not required, these additional qualifications would be advantageous in further enhancing your effectiveness in the role and your ability to contribute to DISCO's growth and success.

Perks of DISCO
• Open, inclusive, and fun environment
• Benefits, including medical and dental insurance
• Competitive salary plus discretionary bonus
• Opportunity to be a part of a startup that is revolutionizing the legal industry
• Growth opportunities throughout the company

About DISCO

DISCO provides a cloud-native, artificial intelligence-powered legal solution that simplifies ediscovery, legal document review and case management for enterprises, law firms, legal services providers and governments. Our scalable, integrated solution enables legal departments to easily collect, process and review enterprise data that is relevant or potentially relevant to legal matters.

Are you ready to help us fulfill our mission to use technology to strengthen the rule of law? Join us!

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Please note that DISCO has a mandatory COVID vaccination policy which requires all employees in the U.S. to be fully vaccinated, subject to applicable legal exemptions

items:
Your Impact

As a Web Developer at DISCO, your role is of utmost importance to our organization. You will have a direct impact on DISCO's success and growth in the legal technology domain. Your contributions will be instrumental in driving conversions, expanding our organic reach, and ultimately shaping the online presence of our company.

By building engaging digital experiences and implementing best-in-class website design and user experience practices, you will play a pivotal role in capturing the attention and interest of our target audience. Your expertise in web development and marketing will enable you to optimize our online platforms, enhancing the user journey and increasing conversion rates.

At DISCO, we prioritize career growth and recognize the value of investing in our team members. In this role, you will have abundant opportunities for professional development and advancement. You will work alongside a talented and collaborative digital marketing team, gaining valuable... experience and acquiring new skills that will contribute to your long-term success.

By joining DISCO as a Web Developer, you will have the chance to make a lasting impact on our company's growth, showcase your creativity and technical expertise, and shape the future of our digital presence in the legal technology market.

What You'll Do
• Develop and maintain the front-end development of the csdisco.com website, focusing on driving conversions and optimizing user experience.
• Take Figma designs provided by web designers and skillfully convert them into responsive, pixel-perfect live web pages that accurately represent the intended visual and interactive experience.
• Implement best-in-class website design practices, ensuring a seamless and visually appealing user interface.
• Create responsive layouts that provide an optimized experience for visitors across various devices, including mobile and tablets.
• Collaborate with the team to implement and test web management services, including tracking pixels, data services, and conversion beacons.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest web development trends and technologies, proactively suggesting enhancements to improve website performance, accessibility, and user engagement.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including design, content, and marketing, to ensure alignment and consistency in brand representation across all digital platforms.
• Regularly monitor and analyze website metrics, leveraging tools such as Google Analytics/Google Tag Manager, to identify opportunities for optimization and conversion rate improvement.
• Take ownership of website maintenance and updates, ensuring timely and accurate content updates, bug fixes, and security patches.
• Manage and prioritize multiple projects based on changing business requirements and deadlines.

Who You Are
• You have a proven track record as a Web Developer with at least 3 years of experience, specializing in responsive B2B websites.
• You possess strong expertise in CSS3, HTML5, and JavaScript.
• You have significant experience working with Webflow or other content management systems, demonstrating your proficiency in utilizing Webflow's features and capabilities.
• You have a passion for marketing and can effectively incorporate B2B digital marketing best practices and marketing technology expertise into your development projects.
• You pay meticulous attention to detail, ensuring pixel-perfect implementation and maintaining consistent branding across the website.
• Familiarity with website analytic tools such as Google Analytics/Google Tag Manager.
• Strong written and verbal communication skills are essential, as you will collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
• You are resourceful, a self-starter, and have a team player mindset, actively contributing ideas and solutions to achieve shared goals.
• Your problem-solving mindset allows you to think creatively and approach challenges with innovative solutions.

In this role, you will have the opportunity to utilize your technical skills, expertise in Webflow, and marketing knowledge to build engaging digital experiences, contribute to the success of DISCO's web presence, and collaborate with a dynamic and talented team.

Even Better If You Have...
• A bachelor's degree or higher in Marketing, Computer Science, Graphic Design, or Engineering.
• Familiarity with Finsweet Client First Design System, such as working with the system's components and following its guidelines for building responsive and accessible web experiences.
• Experience in Enterprise B2B, including working with CRM platforms such as Salesforce and marketing automation platforms like Pardot, Marketo, or Eloqua.
• Experience running A/B tests to evaluate and optimize website performance and user experience.
• Previous experience working at a SaaS software platform, legal technology company, or in a fast-paced technology environment.

While not required, these additional qualifications would be advantageous in further enhancing your effectiveness in the role and your ability to contribute to DISCO's growth and success.

Perks of DISCO
• Open, inclusive, and fun environment
• Benefits, including medical and dental insurance
• Competitive salary plus discretionary bonus
• Opportunity to be a part of a startup that is revolutionizing the legal industry
• Growth opportunities throughout the company

About DISCO

DISCO provides a cloud-native, artificial intelligence-powered legal solution that simplifies ediscovery, legal document review and case management for enterprises, law firms, legal services providers and governments. Our scalable, integrated solution enables legal departments to easily collect, process and review enterprise data that is relevant or potentially relevant to legal matters.

Are you ready to help us fulfill our mission to use technology to strengthen the rule of law? Join us!

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Please note that DISCO has a mandatory COVID vaccination policy which requires all employees in the U.S. to be fully vaccinated, subject to applicable legal exemptions

title: Web Developer
description:
oCode Technologies is seeking a highly skilled and motivated Web Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Web Developer, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining our client's websites and web applications. We are looking for a talented individual who is passionate about creating exceptional web experiences and possesses a strong understanding of front-end and back-end technologies.

Responsibilities:
• Web Development: Design and implement visually appealing and user-friendly websites and web applications using modern web technologies, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and responsive design.
• Front-End Development: Create intuitive and interactive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, while adhering to best practices in web development and accessibility standards.
• Back-End Development: Develop server-side applications and databases to support web applications, using technologies such as PHP, Python, Ruby on Rails, or Node.js.
• Database... Management: Design and optimize databases to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval, and integrate data from various sources to support the functionality of web applications.
• Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and optimize the performance of web applications, ensuring they load quickly and efficiently across different devices and networks.
• Bug Fixing and Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve technical issues and bugs in web applications, working closely with the Quality Assurance team to deliver a smooth and bug-free user experience.
• Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers and product managers, to understand project requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver high-quality solutions on time.
• Testing: Conduct thorough testing of web applications to validate functionality, identify issues, and implement necessary fixes to ensure high-quality deliverables.
• Security: Implement security measures to safeguard web applications against potential vulnerabilities, ensuring data privacy and protection.
• Stay Updated: Keep abreast of the latest web development trends, tools, and technologies, and actively seek opportunities to enhance technical skills and knowledge.

Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field (equivalent work experience may be considered).
• Proven experience as a Web Developer, with a strong portfolio showcasing web development projects.
• Proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery.
• Familiarity with back-end technologies such as PHP, Python, Ruby on Rails, or Node.js.
• Experience with database management systems like MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
• Understanding of version control systems (e.g., Git) and code deployment practices.
• Knowledge of responsive web design principles and mobile-first development.
• Familiarity with web performance optimization techniques.
• Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
• A passion for learning and staying updated with emerging web technologies.

If you are a talented Web Developer with a passion for crafting exceptional web experiences and have the technical expertise to bring innovative ideas to life, we encourage you to apply. title: Web Developer
description:
Job Summary: The Web Development Trainer will be responsible for designing and delivering comprehensive training programs that cover various aspects of web development, including front-end and back-end technologies, programming languages, frameworks, and best practices. The trainer will work closely with the training and development team, as well as subject matter experts within the organization, to develop and implement effective training strategies and materials.

Responsibilities:
• Develop and deliver training programs on web development topics, including Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, front-end frameworks (such as React or Angular), back-end technologies (such as Node.js or PHP), databases, version control systems, and web security.
• Create training materials, including course outlines, slide decks, hands-on exercises, and assessments, to facilitate effective learning and knowledge retention.
• Deliver engaging and interactive training sessions in-person or through virtual... platforms, ensuring active participation and knowledge transfer.
• Conduct training needs assessments to identify skill gaps and develop training plans accordingly.
• Stay updated on the latest web development trends, tools, and technologies, and incorporate them into training programs.
• Evaluate the effectiveness of training programs through feedback, assessments, and performance metrics, and make necessary improvements.
• Collaborate with the curriculum development team to create new training materials and update existing ones to reflect industry advancements.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field. Equivalent professional experience may be considered.
• Minimum of 1 years of experience in web development, with expertise in front-end and/or back-end technologies and frameworks.
• Proven experience in designing and delivering web development training programs, preferably in a training or education environment.
• Strong knowledge of web development languages, such as Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).
• Familiarity with back-end technologies and programming languages, such as Node.js, PHP, Python, or Ruby.
• Experience with database management systems (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB) and version control systems (e.g., Git, SVN).
• Understanding of web security principles and best practices, including authentication, authorization, and secure coding techniques.
• Excellent presentation and communication skills, with the ability to explain complex concepts in a clear and concise manner.
• Passion for teaching and mentoring, with the ability to inspire and motivate learners of different backgrounds and skill levels.
• Continuous learning mindset, staying abreast of emerging web development technologies and best practices.

title: web developer Internship
description:
Position Overview

As a Web Developer Intern, you will have the opportunity to gain valuable hands-on experience while working alongside our experienced development team. Your role will involve assisting in the creation, maintenance, and improvement of web applications and websites. This internship provides an excellent learning environment to enhance your web development skills and familiarize yourself with industry best practices.

Key Responsibilities
• Web Development: Collaborate with the development team to build and implement web applications and websites using modern technologies and programming languages.
• Front-End Development: Assist in creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces, ensuring seamless user experiences across various devices and browsers.
• Back-End Development: Participate in the development of server-side applications and databases to support website functionality and data management.
• Testing and Debugging: Conduct testing and debugging of web... applications to identify and fix any issues or bugs, ensuring a high level of reliability and performance.
• Code Maintenance: Support in maintaining existing web projects, making updates and enhancements as required.
• Documentation: Prepare and maintain technical documentation for projects, including code documentation and version control.
• Research and Learning: Stay updated with the latest web development trends, tools, and technologies to contribute fresh ideas and innovative solutions.
• Collaboration: Work closely with the design and marketing teams to implement website features and functionalities that align with project requirements and business goals.
• '

Qualifications And Skills
• Education: Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
• Technical Proficiency: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and familiarity with front-end frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, or Vue.js) and back-end technologies (e.g., Node.js, Python, PHP, or Ruby on Rails).
• Problem-Solving Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to identify and resolve technical issues efficiently.
• Eagerness to Learn: A passion for web development and a willingness to learn new technologies and programming languages.
• Team Player: Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to collaborate effectively within a team environment.
• Time Management: Demonstrated ability to manage tasks and prioritize projects to meet deadlines effectively.
• Attention to Detail: Meticulous attention to detail, ensuring the accuracy and quality of work.
• Portfolio (if available): Providing a portfolio or examples of previous web development projects would be advantageous but not mandatory.

Skills: wordpress,html,javascrip

title: shopify developer
description:
Shopify Developer Responsibilities
• Make knowledgeable and engaging Shopify store online to increase the revenue and sales.
• Make bespoke themes and change all the pre-existing templates according to the predefined company guidelines.
• Should be a professional in all areas of the E-commerce platform.
• Work with the UI and UX design teams to make the inventive, strong, and unique user experience.
• Ensure smooth connection with the Shopify Apps, Marketing Tools, and Platform APIs.
• Must debug and test out the websites regularly to enhance the performance.
• Offer coordination and technical support to protect the company against failure.
• Increase the conversion rates by optimizing websites.
Shopify Developer Requirements
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or any other similar field.
• Must have maintenance, launch, and shop construction expertise and also have a general understanding of the admin system.
• Expert in JavaScript, DOM, CSS3 and HTML5.
•... Has previous experience in Storefront API and working with custom theme.
• Has working knowledge in liquid templating and theming system of Shopify.
• Previous experience in debugging or implementing 3rd-party Shopify applications and making unique solutions when it’s required.
• Must carry expertise and knowledge with jQuery, current frameworks of JavaScript, vanilla JavaScript, and ES2015/ES6.
• Must carry working knowledge of Shopify properties or objects, Meta fields, and AJAX API.

title: Front-end Developer
description:
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.

Responsibilities
• Develop new user-facing features
• Build reusable code and libraries for future use
• Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
• Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
• Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
• Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders

Skills And Qualifications
• Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
• Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including... jQuery
• Good understanding and experience of ReactJS
• Good communication skills.

Skills: react.js,html,css,javascript,responsive design,design language,frontend developer

title: Senior Frontend Web Developer
description:
Do you think of yourself as a modern-day artist? Read on.

We’re looking for:

An interactive developer to join us at Bombay DC to build high-end digital interfaces for the web and mobile.

You should be:

Deeply and truly in love with code - the language of the connected age. We want to build progressive ideas, and believe coders are the new artists.

The best thing about us:

All our designers understand the code! Less explaining, more building great stuff!

What will you do here?
• You’ll create digital products with React, Angular, HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3, JQuery, and animations, collaborating with our UX and visual designers.
• You’ll work on the latest prototyping tools.
• You’ll experiment with new libraries/frameworks once a day every week.
• You’ll be building a network of like-minded people to bring in for different projects and manage them. You should be as good at finding errors as you’re at pushing pixels!.
• We love people who can build on ideas, join us in the creative... process and yet be the master of their skill. If you can get your hands on design or UX and want to explore your creative side, you have just jumped the queue.
• Oh and just so we are on the same page, you love Ruby on Rails, Code Academy, GitHub, Stack Overflow, right? Just checking!

3 great reasons to work with us:

We are small but global. Our multidisciplinary team has worked in Mumbai, Barcelona, London, Stockholm, and Tokyo. You get it right, you will work with the best in the world!

To us, people are everything. Your growth is as important to us as it is to you. While we don’t have beer taps (yet!), we’ve made sure to create a restriction-free, energy-filled atmosphere.

Our larger purpose? To bring ideas to life, and build the brands of tomorrow. And for our country to realize its true potential for innovation, and stop being known as an outsourcing destination!

Want to join the force? Apply here, or shoot an email to work@bombaydc.com
